welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Richmond Heights, a charming and vibrant city known for its beautiful parks, fantastic restaurants, and friendly community. We invite you to explore and experience all that our city has to offer and we hope you enjoy your stay with us!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Burke Lakefront Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Hopkins International Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: Concourse A serves mainly domestic flights, with a few international flights as well.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: Concourse B is primarily used for domestic flights, but also has a few international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
